sentences.sentence: "I do not want her to go to school," said the old man, unrelentingly.
sentences.translation: “我不想让她去上学。”老人无情地说。

sentences.sentence: With his right hand he unrelentingly kept whacking me with that umbrella.
sentences.translation: 而右手则不停地用伞来打我。

sentences.sentence: Most countries celebrate the best in their pasts. Germany unrelentingly promotes its worst.
sentences.translation: 多数国家乐于宣扬其历史上最具光彩的篇章，德国却不断把自己最丑恶的污点揭开示众。
